Articles.Content:
I found out about KMP today and my friend wanted me to make a server. As I look up how there are no mac Tutorials. Mac is the only computing OS that I have, my question is, is it possible? If so link a video or write instructions down. Thanks!

- SL

Sorry man, as far as I know, the only OSs that run the server are Windows and Linux,

my advice is to get yourself Linux, it's free.
Why is this tagged as a suggestion?
Thread locked. KMP is a mod and not the game itself. If you want a tutorial then ask in the mod's thread
